setting.note_text_1: In case the printed QR code is unreadable, please use a larger paper template or shorten the QR code of the product.
setting.note_text_2: Difficult-to-read QR codes include those containing special characters (@ * ^ , . / ~...) or Vietnamese characters with diacritics, or exceeding 15 characters in length. Please adjust these codes before printing.
setting.size_type: Select the print size and paper type

common.select_time_report: Select the time for the report
common.no_data: No data available. Please choose another reporting time.

tooltip.revenue: Total value of confirmed orders within the selected timeframe, including revenue from canceled orders and returns/refunds.
tooltip.orders: Total number of confirmed orders within the selected timeframe.
tooltip.net_revenue: Total revenue from successfully delivered orders. (Revenue = Product value - Discount amount - Online Mart fee).
tooltip.views: Total number of views on product pages and store pages within the selected timeframe.
tooltip.conversion_rate: The total number of visitors with confirmed orders divided by the total number of visitors within the selected timeframe.
tooltip.average_order: Average revenue per order within the selected timeframe.
tooltip.cancelled_orders: Total number of canceled orders within the selected timeframe.

tooltip.top_products: Revenue is the sum of the values of confirmed orders within the selected timeframe.
tooltip.top_cities: Revenue is the sum of the values of confirmed orders within the selected timeframe.

tooltip.total_views: Total views of product pages and store pages within the selected timeframe.
tooltip.conversion_rate: Total visitors with confirmed orders divided by the total number of visitors within the selected timeframe.
tooltip.total_viewers: Total unique visitors who viewed product pages and store pages within the selected timeframe. Each visitor viewing a product page or store page multiple times is counted only once.
tooltip.total_buyers: Total number of customers who purchased products, calculated based on confirmed orders within the selected timeframe.

operational_efficiency.name: Operational Performance
operational_efficiency.num_awaiting_orders: Number of orders awaiting processing results:
operational_efficiency.score_0: Sorry! We had to turn off the store permanently. This is the 3rd time you have reached an operating score of 0! Therefore, we regret having to close the store permanently.
operational_efficiency.score_1: This is the second time you have achieved an operating score of 0! We have to temporarily close the store for 14 days. Note: After being locked 2 times by the operating point, the 3rd time your booth will be locked permanently.
operational_efficiency.score_2: Sorry! We have to temporarily close the store for 7 days. Please refer to solutions to improve scores and operational quality here to be ready when the store reopens!
operational_efficiency.score_3: Oh no… Your performance is not good. Let's focus on improving order processing speed! Note: If your operations score drops to 0 next week, we will temporarily disable your store for 7 days to give you time to improve your operations.
operational_efficiency.score_4: You are handling orders quite well! Speed up a little more to become an excellent order processing seller and optimize conversion rate!
operational_efficiency.score_5: Great! You're doing an excellent job processing orders this past week! Keep up the good work to get more 5-star reviews and receive more perks from us!

caption.complete_all: Complete all requirements to activate the profile.
